namuth thawamath lokaye ratawal siyayaka pamana maleriya rogaya athi bawath, janagahanaya anuwa eya 40% ka pamana prathishathayak bawath prakasha karana aya maleriyawa athi indiyawa, pakisthanaya wani ratawalata gos aapasu paminena pudgalayan nisath ema ratawala sita paminena pudgalayan nisath shri lankawata maleriya rogaya paminiya haki bawa sandahan kara thibe.
